title: India's new aspiring middle class to fuel economy, mobility sector growth: PM Modi at Bharat Mobility Show
description: Holding that India will surely become the third largest economy in the world in his third term, the Prime Minister, said there are immense opportunities for stakeholders to grow business. “India is on the move and is moving fast”, the Prime Minister said, adding it is the beginning of the golden period for the mobility sector.
